effect.x_y: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.

short_effect.x_y: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.

flavor_text.x_y: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.
